description:
Evaluation type
Company
Limit date
In charge of evaluation
Description

Annual appraisal

Axelor wants to offer the best possible employee experience, and to do this we want to facilitate exchanges, in particular through the annual performance review. This interview will enable each employee to discuss positive and negative points, as well as areas for improvement.

Interview date:

Job position:

How did you experience the past year at Axelor?

Self-evaluation:

Grading:

  • Insufficient: The objective has not been achieved, and we'll need to focus on this point as a priority.
  • Needs improvement: The mission has been partially achieved, but there are still points to be improved or completed to make it a complete success.
  • Objective achieved: The mission has been achieved. The objective has been fully achieved.
  • Objective exceeded: the mission has been completely fulfilled, and the employee has even gone beyond expectations by carrying out optimizations that were not initially included in the mission.

    • Quality of work:

    insufficient To improve Goal reached
    Deadlines
    Work quality
    Ability to work independently

    Work interest:

    insufficient To improve Goal reached
    Implication / Motivaton for the position
    Ajustment
    Rigor / Organization

    Communication:

    insufficient To improve Goal reached
    Knowledge transfer
    Suggest solution & improvements

    Work behaviour:

    insufficient To improve Goal reached
    Disponibility / Adaptability
    Ponctuality
    Capacity to work in group

    Are you experiencing any difficulties in your job? If so, how can you overcome them?

    Goals Action plan

    Would you like to see any changes in your work (organization, missions, methods, etc.)? If so, please specify:

    Are there any other points you'd like to raise during the interview? If so, which ones?
